turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Varghese Chakkalakal.
turn.1: What happened in the diocese of Calicut?
turn.2: Varghese Chakkalakal Bishop Varghese Chakkalakal is the current bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Calicut.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: Varghese was born on 7 February 1953 at Malapallipuram, Kerala, India.
turn.6: He acquired his Master of Theology from Pontifical Seminary, Aluva, Kerala, India and also completed his Master of Arts specialising in History from University of Mysore.
turn.8: He acquired his doctorate in canon law from Pontifical Urban University, Rome.
turn.9: What did he do after that?
turn.10: He was a professor of Fundamental Theology, Canon Law and Moral Theology.
